name: GitHub Blog
description: An application that uses the GitHub API to fetch issues from a repository, data from my user profile and display them as a blog.

name: Portuguese Address Finder (Crawler)
description: A crawler to retrieve portuguese address using the postal code, made in Python.

name: Coffee Delivery Ecommerce
description: A Coffee ecommerce with a functional checkout.

name: Interactive Pricing Component
description: An Interactive pricing component using VueJS and Atomic Design principles.

name: Link Shortener Website
description: An interactive website with a link shortener feature using the BitLy Api.

name: Multi Step Form
description: An application made in React and TypeScript that represents a form for filling in user data and selecting plans with price changes.
